idea-plugin.name: Visual Studio 2013 - Dark Color Scheme
idea-plugin.description:
Visual Studio 2013 - Dark Color Scheme


GitHub | Issues

This is a Color Scheme that is inspired by Visual Studio 2013.

Tested and Supported Languages
  • Java
  • Python
  • Rust
  • XML
  • HTML
  • YAML
  • Paradox Language

Other languages may work.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 1.3
    1. Improved Paradox Language support
    2. Improved documentation background color
  • 1.2
    1. Improved YAML support
  • 1.1
    1. Improved Python support
  • 1.0
    1. Initial release
